But <S%G1161><s%> she that liveth in <S%G4684>pleasure<s%> is <S%G2348>dead<s%> while she <S%G2198>liveth.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> give in <S%G3853>charge,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G423>blameless.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> provide not <S%G4306>for<s%> <S%G3756><s%> his <S%G2398>own,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> for those of his own <S%G3609>house,<s%> he hath <S%G720>denied<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5501>worse<s%> than an <S%G571>infidel.<s%>

Well reported <S%G3140>of<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works;<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she have brought up <S%G5044>children,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she have lodged <S%G3580>strangers,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she have <S%G3538>washed<s%> the <S%G40>saints'<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she have <S%G1884>relieved<s%> the <S%G2346>afflicted,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she have diligently <S%G1872>followed<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>

I <S%G1014>will<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> that the younger <S%G3501>women<s%> <S%G1060>marry,<s%> bear <S%G5041>children,<s%> guide the <S%G3616>house,<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3367>none<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G480>adversary<s%> to speak <S%G5484>reproachfully.<s%> <S%G3059><s%>

Let <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> that <S%G4291>rule<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> be counted <S%G515>worthy<s%> of <S%G1362>double<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> they who <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>saith,<s%> Thou shalt <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5392>muzzle<s%> the <S%G1016>ox<s%> that treadeth <S%G248>out<s%> the corn. <S%G2532>And,<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G2040>laborer<s%> is <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3408>reward.<s%>

Against <S%G2596><s%> an <S%G4245>elder<s%> <S%G3858>receive<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> an <S%G2724>accusation,<s%> <S%G1622>but<s%> <S%G1508><s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses.<s%>
Them that <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G1651>rebuke<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3062>others<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G2192>fear.<s%> <S%G5401><s%>

I <S%G1263>charge<s%> thee <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1588>elect<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> thou <S%G5442>observe<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> preferring one before <S%G4299>another,<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G4346>partiality.<s%>

Lay <S%G2007><s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G5030>suddenly<s%> on no <S%G3367>man,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> be <S%G2841>partaker<s%> of other <S%G245>men's<s%> <S%G266>sins:<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G53>pure.<s%>
